body_html: @ducksoup : I dont think the duration has got anything to do with it --- One model run has been running without a problem for the last 18 hours, the other one had quit last night pretty early on (Crashed after the backward pass of the 8th batch). I have just restarted it and watching it.

I have just restarted it and watching it.
body: @ducksoup : I dont think the duration has got anything to do with it ---  One model run has been running without a problem for the last 18 hours, the other one had quit last night pretty early on (Crashed after the backward pass of the 8th batch). I have just restarted it and watching it.
